mapper.insert: insert into movie ( name, photo, filestorageId, doubanId) values ( #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{photo.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{filestorageid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{doubanid,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update movie set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, photo = #{photo.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, filestorageId = #{filestorageid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, doubanId = #{doubanid,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select m.id,m.name,m.photo,m.filestorageId,m.doubanId,f.id as f_id,f.path as f_path,f.name as f_name,f.linkId as f_linkId,f.type as f_type,f.isDir as f_isDir from movie m left join filestorage f on m.photo=f.id
